    WHERE m."ChatID" = @__ChatID_0
    ORDER BY m."Timestamp" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_2 OFFSET @__p_1
) AS m0
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON m0."OriginID" = u."ID"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT m1."MessageId", m1."UserId", u0."ID", u0."PasswordHash", u0."Role", u0."Username"
    FROM "MessageReadUsers" AS m1
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u0 ON m1."UserId" = u0."ID"
) AS s ON m0."ID" = s."MessageId"
ORDER BY m0."Timestamp" DESC, m0."ID", u."ID", s."MessageId", s."UserId"

Properties.commandText: LOCK TABLE "__EFMigrationsHistory" IN ACCESS EXCLUSIVE MODE

CREATE TABLE "Users" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Username" text NOT NULL,
    "PasswordHash" text NOT NULL,
    "Role" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Users" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "AK_Users_Username" UNIQUE ("Username")
);

CREATE TABLE "Chats" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Name" text NOT NULL,
    "OwnerID" bigint,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Chats" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_OwnerChat" FOREIGN KEY ("OwnerID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

CREATE TABLE "RefreshTokens" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "UserID" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Token" text NOT NULL,
    "IssuedAt" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "ExpiresAt" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_RefreshTokens" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_RefreshTokens_Users_UserID" FOREIGN KEY ("UserID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

CREATE TABLE "Messages" (
    "ID" bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "OriginID" bigint NOT NULL,
    "DestinationID" bigint,
    "isRead" boolean NOT NULL,
    "chatID" bigint,
    "ChatID" bigint,
    "Text" text NOT NULL,
    "Timestamp" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Messages" PRIMARY KEY ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Messages_Chats_ChatID" FOREIGN KEY ("ChatID") REFERENCES "Chats" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Messages_Chats_chatID" FOREIGN KEY ("chatID") REFERENCES "Chats" ("ID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Messages_Users_DestinationID" FOREIGN KEY ("DestinationID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Messages_Users_OriginID" FOREIGN KEY ("OriginID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

CREATE TABLE "UserChatJoinTable" (
    "ChatID" bigint NOT NULL,
    "UserID" bigint NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_UserChatJoinTable" PRIMARY KEY ("ChatID", "UserID"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_UserChatJoinTable_Chats_ChatID" FOREIGN KEY ("ChatID") REFERENCES "Chats" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_UserChatJoinTable_Users_UserID" FOREIGN KEY ("UserID") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE "MessageReadUsers" (
    "MessageId" bigint NOT NULL,
    "UserId" bigint NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_MessageReadUsers" PRIMARY KEY ("MessageId", "UserId"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_MessageReadUsers_Messages_MessageId" FOREIGN KEY ("MessageId") REFERENCES "Messages" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_MessageReadUsers_Users_UserId" FOREIGN KEY ("UserId") REFERENCES "Users" ("ID") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE INDEX "IX_Chats_OwnerID" ON "Chats" ("OwnerID");
CREATE INDEX "IX_MessageReadUsers_UserId" ON "MessageReadUsers" ("UserId");
CREATE INDEX "IX_Messages_chatID" ON "Messages" ("chatID");
CREATE INDEX "IX_Messages_ChatId_CreatedAt_Desc" ON "Messages" ("ChatID", "Timestamp" DESC);
CREATE INDEX "IX_Messages_DestinationID" ON "Messages" ("DestinationID");
CREATE INDEX "IX_Messages_OriginID" ON "Messages" ("OriginID");
CREATE INDEX "IX_RefreshTokens_UserID" ON "RefreshTokens" ("UserID");
CREATE INDEX "IX_UserChatJoinTable_UserID" ON "UserChatJoinTable" ("UserID");

SELECT u."ID", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Username"
FROM "Users" AS u
WHERE u."Username" = @__userCreds_Username_0
LIMIT 1

SELECT c0."ID", c0."Name", c0."OwnerID", s."ChatID", s."UserID", s."ID", s."PasswordHash", s."Role", s."Username"
FROM (
    SELECT c."ID", c."Name", c."OwnerID"
    FROM "Chats" AS c
    WHERE c."ID" = @__ChatID_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS c0
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT u."ChatID", u."UserID", u0."ID", u0."PasswordHash", u0."Role", u0."Username"
    FROM "UserChatJoinTable" AS u
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u0 ON u."UserID" = u0."ID"
) AS s ON c0."ID" = s."ChatID"
ORDER BY c0."ID", s."ChatID", s."UserID"

SELECT u."ID", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Username"
FROM "Users" AS u
WHERE u."ID" = @__UserID_0
LIMIT 1

SELECT m0."ID", m0."ChatID", m0."DestinationID", m0."OriginID", m0."Text", m0."Timestamp", m0."chatID0", m0."isRead", u."ID", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Username", s."MessageId", s."UserId", s."ID", s."PasswordHash", s."Role", s."Username"
FROM (
    SELECT m."ID", m."ChatID", m."DestinationID", m."OriginID", m."Text", m."Timestamp", m."chatID" AS "chatID0", m."isRead"
    FROM "Messages" AS m
    WHERE m."ChatID" = @__ChatID_0
    ORDER BY m."Timestamp" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_2 OFFSET @__p_1
) AS m0
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON m0."OriginID" = u."ID"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT m1."MessageId", m1."UserId", u0."ID", u0."PasswordHash", u0."Role", u0."Username"
    FROM "MessageReadUsers" AS m1
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u0 ON m1."UserId" = u0."ID"
) AS s ON m0."ID" = s."MessageId"
ORDER BY m0."Timestamp" DESC, m0."ID", u."ID", s."MessageId", s."UserId"

SELECT r."ID", r."JTI", r."Token"
FROM revoked_jwts AS r
WHERE r."JTI" = @__jti_0
LIMIT 1
